descriptions:
Introducing the Darkecho Gaming Office Chair with Footrest Massage Racing Ergonomic Leather Reclining Video Game Chair! This chair is perfect for gamers and office professionals alike, offering premium comfort and style.

Crafted with premium soft PU leather and hand-sewn diamond cross stitching, this chair exudes luxury. The USB powered lumbar pillow provides a soothing massage function, allowing you to relax and unwind during long gaming or work sessions.

The chair back can recline from 90° to 155°, providing adjustable comfort to suit your preferences. With a smooth 360° swivel and adjustable height, you can easily find the perfect position. The rocking feature allows for gentle movement, while the armrests can be adjusted both vertically and horizontally, ensuring optimal support for your arms.

Built with an integrated metal frame and a 5-point heavy-duty anti-rollover wheelbase, this chair is designed for stability and durability. It has undergone rigorous 2000 miles rolling tests to ensure its long-lasting quality. The thickened explosion-proof chassis and tilt mechanism control provide additional safety and stability. The chair also features a safety lock to prevent overturning.

The SGS and BIFMA certificated gas cylinder ensures durability and supports a maximum weight capacity of 330lb, making it suitable for users of all sizes. We are confident in the quality of our product, which is why we offer a one-month free return policy and a 5-year chair parts free replacement warranty.

The Darkecho Gaming Office Chair is not only comfortable but also ergonomic. It comes with a retractable footrest, a detachable and adjustable headrest, and an adjustable lumbar support pillow. These features ensure proper alignment and support for your body, reducing strain and promoting good posture.

In a stylish purple color, this chair will add a touch of elegance to any gaming or office setup. It is suitable for both gaming enthusiasts and professionals who spend long hours at their desks. 

Assembly is a breeze with easy-to-follow instructions and pre-assembled screws included. Plus, our dedicated customer service team is available 24/7 to assist you with any queries or concerns.

Invest in the Darkecho Gaming Office Chair with Footrest Massage Racing Ergonomic Leather Reclining Video Game Chair today and experience the ultimate in comfort, style, and support.

Introducing the Darkecho Gaming Office Chair with Footrest Massage Racing Ergonomic Leather Reclining Video Game Chair! Get ready to elevate your gaming experience to new heights with this premium chair. 

Crafted with the highest quality materials, this chair features a luxurious soft PU leather that is both comfortable and durable. The hand-sewn diamond cross stitching adds a touch of elegance and sophistication to the design.

But that's not all! This chair comes with a USB powered lumbar pillow that offers a soothing massage function, allowing you to relax and unwind during those intense gaming sessions. The chair back can be reclined from 90° to 155°, providing the perfect angle for maximum comfort.

Experience smooth and effortless movement with the 360° swivel feature. The chair is also height adjustable, ensuring you can find the perfect position for your gaming needs. Rocking motion is available at a comfortable 15°, adding an extra layer of relaxation.

The adjustable armrests can be moved up and down as well as right and left, providing customizable support for your arms. Coated in soft PU leather, they offer a comfortable resting place for your elbows during long gaming sessions.

Safety and stability are top priorities with this chair. It is built with an integrated metal frame and a 5-point heavy-duty anti-rollover wheelbase that has undergone rigorous 2000 miles rolling tests. The thickened explosion-proof chassis and tilt mechanism control ensure long-lasting durability.

With a weight capacity of 330lb, this chair is designed to accommodate gamers of all sizes. Plus, it comes with a one-month free return policy and a 5-year warranty on chair parts, giving you peace of mind with your purchase.

But it's not just for gaming! This chair is also perfect for office work, providing the comfort and support you need for long hours at your desk.

Assembly is a breeze with easy-to-follow instructions and pre-assembled screws included. And if you have any questions or concerns, our customer service team is available 24/7 to assist you.

Upgrade your gaming setup with the Darkecho Gaming Office Chair with Footrest Massage Racing Ergonomic Leather Reclining Video Game Chair. Don't miss out on this incredible chair that combines style, comfort, and functionality. Get yours today and experience gaming like never before!

With a chair back that can recline from 90° to 155°, you can find the perfect angle for your comfort. The smooth 360° swivel allows for easy movement, and the chair is height adjustable to accommodate users of different heights. 

The chair also has a rocking feature that allows you to tilt it up to 15°. The armrests are adjustable both up and down, as well as right and left, and are coated in soft PU leather for added comfort. 

Built with an integrated metal frame and a 5-point heavy-duty anti-rollover wheelbase, this chair is sturdy and durable. It has undergone 2000 miles rolling tests to ensure its quality. The thickened explosion-proof chassis and tilt mechanism control provide added safety and stability. 

The chair has a maximum weight capacity of 330lb, making it suitable for users of various sizes. It comes with a one-month free return policy and a 5-year warranty on chair parts, giving you peace of mind with your purchase.
